amendatorysection.para: Public entity means a municipality, a registered group of municipalities, a public power district, a public power and irrigation district, an electric cooperative, an electric membership association, a joint entity formed under the Interlocal Cooperation Act, a joint public agency formed under the Joint Public Agency Act, an agency formed under the Municipal Cooperative Financing Act, or any other governmental entity.

crossreference.para: Joint Public Agency Act, see section 13-2501.
Municipal Cooperative Financing Act, see section 18-2401.
